content: **klick free ravelry download -link above there you can see and download each clue separately ** baltic flowers mkal is a mystery knit along that is run primary in my instagram account ** niinas knit scene 1 ** on 20 8-16 9 2022 i will publish the instructions here also but i cannot guarantee that they will be here the same day as in my instagram later the complete pattern will be published here also this pattern is released as a series of 11 clues on the following dates clue 1 august 20 2022 clue 2 august 23 clue 3 august 26 clue 4 august 27 clue 5 august 30 clue 6 september 1 clue 7 september 4 clue 8 september 8 clue 9 september 11 clue 10 september 13 clue 11 and final pattern september 16 **size ** 37-38 39-40 41-42 43-44 size depends on gauge gauge used to make these instructions is 10x10cm = 32 sts 35 row if your gauge differs remarkably consider using different needle size the circumference of leg is approximately 20-21 23-24 25-26 27-28 cm and circumference of foot 17-18 20-21 22-23 24-25 cm length of the leg is about 28 cm **yarn ** filcolana arwetta classic mc 80g 977 marzipan cc1 25g 198 tangerine cc2 15g 973 nougat or other yarn the same thickness 210 m/ 50 g if you choose different colors make sure that the contrast colors differ enough from main color contrast colors don t need to stand out from each other one way to ensure that the pattern is visible is to take picture from yarns you would like to use turn picture into black and white if you see the difference there is a good chance that the pattern stands out just fine to make sure knit a test piece **needles ** 2 5mm 3 0mm or size required to get gauge right **you also need ** blunt sewing needle stitch markers **other notes ** the socks are worked from the cuff to toe the beginning of the round is behind the leg and on the sole the instructions are made for knitting with 4 double pointed needles *hope you enjoy taking part in my mystery knit along * *i love taking part in mystery knit alongs when baltic flowers -pattern started to build up i realized that it would be great for knit along and even better for mystery knit along why i like mystery knit alongs so much besides knitting together is the guessing what would come next and then seeing something completely different from what i thought and then liking it even better i hope this knit along gives you just those sensations * *when you post your work on social media please use #balticflowersmkal because i would love to see your version of my design * *i wish you mysterious and surprising knitting moments * *-niina* 1 https //www instagram com/niinas knit scene/
